Package odase.concurrency

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CallableWithKB<T>
    A Thread that is used with KnowledgeBase.
    OdaseFuture<T>
    OdaseFuture is a Future with extra methods that interact with odase.concurrency.
    OdaseRunnable
    A runnable object whose run method may throw exceptions.
    RunnableWithKB
    A runnable object whose run method may access a knowledge base.
    TaskListener
    A task listener can receive task-related events.
    WaitObject
    This interface allows threads to block on the completion of tasks.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractTask
    An abstract task for ODASE.
    BatchWorker
    The batch worker is a task that will run several sub-tasks using the same knowledge base.
    CallableTask<T>
    A task that handles a Callable.
    DependencyQueue
    A dependency-aware but otherwise FIFO queue.
    OdaseExecutor
    The OdaseExecutor manages Odase's threads for concurrent queries.
    OdaseThreadFactory
    ODASE's thread factory.
    ReadersWritersLock
    A standard readers and writiers lock solution.
    RunnableTask
    A runnable task is an AbastractTask that executes a Runnable object.
    WaitObjectSet
    A set of wait objects that has the interface of a single wait object.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ConcurrencyException
    An exception related to concurrent programming.
